text: Germiston Stadium during a school athletics competition. Germiston Stadium (formerly the Herman Immelman Stadium) is a multi-purpose stadium in Germiston, South Africa. It is currently used mostly for rugby matches and is the home stadium of Germiston Simmer Rugby Club . It is also used for inter- school athletics events and as a training venue for teams such as Bafana Bafana (the South African National Football Team) and the Lions. The stadium holds 18,000 people. title: Germiston Stadium
